title: Compliance with procedures not required when
context: ยง514C-4 Compliance with procedures not required when. Nothing in this part shall prohibit any lessor and association of condominium owners or cooperative housing corporation from agreeing to the sale and purchase of the leased fee interest or any part thereof. [L 1988, c 298, pt of ยง1; am L 1999, c 241, ยง3(4)]
